silver: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 18 gold.

Gain a free Shop reroll after every 4 rerolls.
At the start of the next 2 rounds, gain a random item component.
After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 30% more damage.
Gain 9 free Shop rerolls that never expire.
Gain a random component. Whenever you would get a random component, instead gain a component anvil.
Your champions holding an item gain 200 health.
Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.
When a champion dies, the nearest ally with open slots receieves a temporary copy of an item they were holding and a 10% max Health Shield.
Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.
If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 15 Armor and Magic Resist.

Your team has 10% Omnivamp and convert 20% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

Round start: items on your bench are randomized (except Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain a random component.
Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more.
Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost Tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.
Your team's attacks burn their targets for 5% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.
Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 Player combats, gain 30 Gold.
After 8 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) equipped with 1 random Support item(s), which cannot be removed.
Gain 1 random component and 2 random Tier 3 champions.
Increase your current and maximum player health by 30.
You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 3 Gold.
Combat start: units with adjacent allies gain a 150 Health shield for 8 seconds. This shield stacks.

Your team gains 20 Health. Gain another 2 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)
Your team gains 5% Attack Speed and is immune to the first crowd control effect in combat.
When you reach Level 9, gain 10 gold and 50.
After 8 player combats. choose 1 of 4 Support items.
Champions that aren't holding items have a 35% to drop 1 gold on death.
Gain 3 gold whenever you break your win or loss streak.
Champions that aren't holding items Shred and Sunder enemies for 3 seconds. Physical damage Sunders for 30%, and magic damage Shreds for 30%.
Gain 4 components after you lose 50 player health.
Units isolated in pairs gain 12% Attack Speed and 10 Armor at the start of combat.
gold: Gain a Deathblade. Champions holding this item have a 20% chance to drop 1 gold on kill.

Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and a Reforger.

Gain a Blacksmith's Gloves, which equips two temporary Artifacts each round.
If you have no champions on your bench at the end of player combat round, gain 3 experience points.
If your bench is full at the end of player combat round, gain 3 experience points. Gain 4 random Tier 1 champions.
Your team gains a 90-170 Health shield for 6 seconds after casting their Ability. The shield amount scales with round of the game.
After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.
Combat Start: Infect the highest health enemy, increasing their damage taken by 18%. Every 5 seconds and on death, the infection spreads to 2 nearby units.
Your champions holding an item gain 300 health.
Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2.5 Mana per second.
Enemies have a 30% chance to drop loot when killed.
All enemies take 1% of their max Health as true damage each second until they cast their Ability. Gain a Shroud of Stillness.
Gain a Training Dummy. Each round, if it survives combat, gain 3 gold.
If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist.
Gain a Titan's Resolve. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 40 instead of 25.
Your units gain 3% Attack Damage, 3 Ability Power, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist. When one of your units dies, all your units gain these stats again.

Your team has 15% Omnivamp and convert 25% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

Combat start: Up to 5 equipped components turn into completed items for the rest of combat. Gain a component at the start of the next 2 stages.
Your team restores 20 Mana every 5 seconds.
Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 15% Critical Strike chance.
After you reroll your shop 8 times, reroll only cost 1 gold.
Your team deals 10% more damage. Deal 15% more damage instead if you and your opponent have any of the same traits active.
The first time you would be eliminated, you escape death and your team permanently gains 160 Health, 16 Armor and Magic Resist, and 16% Omnivamp.
After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.
Combat start: Your two furthest champions form a bond, sharing 20% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.
Whenever one of your units dies, all allies heal for 9% of Maximum health
Gain 2 player health after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.
Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain 35% Attack Speed.
Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 18% Ability Power.

Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

Gain 1 random completed item.
Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more.
When you reroll your Shop 16 times, gain a Tactician's Crown.
Gain 12 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.
Gain 18 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.
Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).
Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).
Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 30% chance to gain a free reroll.
Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding this item gain 200 Health and 20% Attack Speed.
The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 5 gold.
Gain 1 Training Dummy with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).
Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.
Your team gains 75 Health for each unique 3-cost champion on your board.
Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.
Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 2 gold.
Your team gains 110 Health for each unique 2-cost champion on your board.
Gain 2 gold after losing a player combat. Gain a random component after every 4 losses.
Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.
Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.
Allies sharing a trait with your Headliner gain 200 Health and 10% Attack Speed.
Every 3 attacks, Big Shots also fires a bomb that deals 100% Attack Damage to enemies within 1 hex of the target. Gain a Kaisa.
Units isolated in pairs gain 15% Attack Speed and 20 Armor at the start of combat.
Your 8-Bit champions execute targets below @ExecuteThreshold*100@% Health. Executions have a 10% chance to drop 1 gold, increased by 2% for each high score achieved. Gain a Corki and a Garen.
The first time your Headliner dies, they become invulnerable and heal 60% of their max Health over 1.5 seconds instead.
Your Pentakill champions are immune to crowd control for the first 12 seconds of combat. They heal 4% of their max Health on takedown. Gain a Kayle and a Gnar.
When a unit dies, the nearest ally gains a 25% max Health shield and 10% stacking Attack Speed.
Edgelords attacks deal 40% of their damage to enemies within 1 hexes of their target. Gain a Yasuo and a Kayle.
Gain an Adaptive Helm. Champions holding this item gain both effects.
When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 300 Health, 30% Attack Speed. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

Gain a Bard. Combat start: Jazz champions gain permanent bonuses based on the number of active traits. 3: 20 max Health
5: and 2% Attack Speed
7: and 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power
Gain 2 Target Dummies. Combat start: Your Target Dummies launch themselves towards the largest clump of enemies and Stun them for 1.25 seconds.
Immediately sell your team (including bench) for double their value. Your next 8 Shop rerolls are free only for this round.
Your units with at least 1500 max Health gain Attack Damage and Ability Power equal to 1% of their max Health.

Your team gains 50 Health. Gain another 6 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)
Your team gains 10 bonus Ability Power, and permanently gains 1 Ability Power every 2 takedowns.
Your Disco Balls affect allies up to 2 hexes away and pulse every 2.5 seconds. Gain a Nami and a Gragas.
Damage from Executioners' attacks and spells Shred and Sunder enemies by 30% for 3 seconds. Gain a Twitch.
Gain a Training Dummy and 2 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.
Gain a Statikk Shiv. Your Stikk Shivs' chain lightning effect deals 40~125% more damage.
Enemies that attack a Guardian's shield take magic damage equal to 7% of the shielded unit's max Health (up to once per second). Gain a Pantheon.
The damage over time effect from your Dazzlers lasts 2 seconds longer and deals 100% more damage. Gain a Nami and a Bard.
Your team gains 80 bonus Health, and permanently gains 10 Health every 2 takedowns.
Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% to drop 1 gold on death.
Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 75 and 9% Attack Speed for each 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your field.
Gain a Crownguard. Your Crownguards' start of combat effect is 75% stronger.
On death, Bruisers deal 35% of their max Health to enemies within 1 hex. After 15 seconds, expand the range to 2 hexes. Gain an Olaf and a Gragas.
When your Spellweavers cast their 2nd Ability each combat, they instantly cast it again at 50% effectiveness. Gain a Gragas and a Seraphine.
Your max interest is capped at 3 gold but you gain 2 gold at the start of every player combat.
Country champions have a 20% chance to drop 1 gold on kill. Your Dreadsteed's chances are doubled. Gain a Samira.
Gain a Gambler's Blade and a Magnetic Remover.
Rapidfire champions can gain Attack Speed from their trait up to 30 stacks. (Now starts Rapidfire champs at 4 stacks immediately) Gain a Jinx and a Senna.
For each adjacent ally, Moshers gain 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, and 4% Attack Speed. Gain a Jax and a Gnar.
Allies of your Emo champions gain 60% of the Emo Mana bonus when any ally dies. Gain an Annie and a Vex.
Your True Damage champions gain 80 Health and 8% Attack Speed for each item they are holding. Gain a Yasuo and a Senna.
Combat start: units with adjacent allies gain a 220 Health shield for 8 seconds. This shield stacks.
Your Headliner's damage heals your Superfans for 22% of the damage dealt. Gain a Gnar.

prismatic: Caretaker's Chosen

As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: Component Anvil
Level 6: Completed Item Anvil
Level 8: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items.
Binary Airdrop
Combat start: champions holding 2 items gain a random 3rd completed item. Gain a 2 Gold.
Birthday Present
Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's tier is your level minus 4 (min: Tier 1).
Blinding Speed
Gain a Red Buff and a Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve bow, a Magnetic Remover.
Buried Treasures III
At the start of the next 6 rounds, gain a random item component.
Final Ascension
Your team deals 15 more damage. After 15 seconds, they deal 45% more damage.
Cursed Crown
Gain +2 max team size, but take 100% more player damage when you lose a player combat.
Cybernetic Bulk III
Your champions holding an item gain 500 health.
Cybernetic Uplink III
Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and restore 3.5 Mana per second.
Spoils of War III
Enemies have a 40% chance to drop loot when killed.
Final Reserves
The first time you would be eliminated, you instead remain alive. After this happens, gain 70 XP and set your gold to 50. Excess gold is converted to XP.
Prisimatic Ticket
Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 45% chance to gain a free reroll.
Jeweled Lotus III
Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 40% Critical Strike chance.
Harmacist III
Your units heal for 25% of the damage they deal, and they convert 30% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.
Hedge Fund
Gain 20 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.
Hedge Fund+
Gain 30 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 10.
Hedge Fund++
Gain 40 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 10.
Shopping Spree
Gain 1 gold per round. When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level, which carry over between rounds.
Impenetrable Bulwark
Gain a Bramble Vest, a Dragon's Claw, a Giant's Belt, and a Magnetic Remover.
Infernal Contract
Your max level is 7. Gain 90 Gold.
Living Forge
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 10 player combats.
Lucky Gloves
Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.
Lucky Gloves+
Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.
Level Up!
When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 8 immediately.
Wellness Trust
Round Start: Gain 3 gold. If you have at least 40 gold, heal 2 player Health.
New Recruit
Gain +1 max team size and a Champion Duplicator.
Endless Hordes
Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 4 gold.
Endless Hordes+
Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 4 gold.
Overwhelming Force
Gain a Deathblade and an Infinity Edge, a BF Sword, and a Magnetic Remover.
Pandora's Items III

Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

Gain a random Radiant item.
Phreaky Friday
Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.
Phreaky Friday+
Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.
Pumping Up III
Your team gains 12% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more.
Radiant Relics
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.
Roll The Dice
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.
Cruel Pact
Buying XP costs 6 Health instead of 4 gold. Heal 3 player health before each player combat.
March of Progress
Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.
Starter Kit

Gain a 4-cost champion and a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again. Gain 4 gold.
Stationary Support III
Gain 1 Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Support item(s).
The Golden Egg
Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.
Tiniest Titan
Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.
Tiniest Titan+

Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

Gain 15 gold now.
Unleashed Arcana
Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Magnetic Remover.
What The Forge
Completed items you own (except Tactician's Crown and Emblems) are transformed into random Artifacts. Champions gain 110 Health per equipped Artifact.
Talent Search
All of your champions gain their unique Headliner effect. In Addition, your Headliner gains 100 Health and 10% Attack Speed.
Determined investors

The first time you have 40 gold at the end of combat, gain Diamond Hands and 2 item component(s).

This defensive item helps you gain more gold.
Twin Terror II
When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 450 Health, 45% Attack Speed. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.
Going Long

Gain 8 gold. You no longer gain interest. Round start: gain 4 XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.
Hologram
Create a clone of your Headliner champion with 100%-130% of its base health (based on stage level). You cannot equip items on the clone.
